DOC.brief_title: Biphasic Defibrillation Study : Trial Compare Fixed Versus Escalating Energy
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot , enroll 200 subject , allow reasonable estimate effect size , turn , allow accurate design plan definitive randomize controlled trial . The following outcome evaluate : 1 . Important Clinical Outcomes : - Successful conversion , - Resuscitation one hour , - Survival hospital discharge , - Neurological function , - Quality life . 2 . Process Outcomes : - Number shock require , - Recurrences VF , - Responsiveness vary period pulselessness . 3 . Adverse Outcomes : - Myocardial damage .
